entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 18. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
